long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reclaim is a powerful browser extension that can block websites, convert them to grayscale, and more. Looking to curb a social media or internet addiction? Reclaim provides tools to help you limit your time on websites of your choosing.

You can block certain websites completely, or confirm that you really want to visit a site before allowing access. Reclaim also includes options to convert websites to grayscale or blur them, which can reduce the appeal of scrolling.

A full list of Reclaim’s features is below:

🚫 Block time-wasting websites.
Fed up with mindlessly scrolling but keep doing it anyway? Reclaim has a site-blocker feature that can prevent you from visiting websites.

✅ Confirm tempting websites.
Have a little more self control but need a reminder? Reclaim can ask you if you're sure you'd like to visit websites.

📃 Grayscale distracting websites.
Find a website too colorful and distracting? Reclaim can convert websites to grayscale.

🌫 Blur addictive websites.
Want to make it harder to use an addictive website? Reclaim can make websites blurry.

⚙️ Use a custom sitelist.
Tailor Reclaim to your needs by creating a personalized sitelist. Add or remove websites based on your productivity goals.

🕶️ Works in incognito mode.
Reclaim extends its functionality to incognito mode, ensuring your browsing habits stay on track even in private sessions. Note that you must enable this feature: from chrome://extensions, click "details" next to Reclaim, and then select "allow in Incognito." https://evanbaldonado.com/reclaim/#incognito 

🕵️ No tracking.
Rest easy knowing that Reclaim respects your privacy. We don't track your browsing habits; our focus is solely on helping you stay productive. All extension data is stored locally, and Reclaim does not track any extension usage within the extension. More information: https://evanbaldonado.com/reclaim/policies/ 

🔄 Import/export settings and sitelists.
Seamlessly manage your Reclaim settings by importing or exporting configurations. Move effortlessly between devices or share your setup with friends.

🍎Follow an installation tutorial guide.
Embark on your Reclaim journey with our step-by-step set-up tutorial guide, which will automatically open when you open Reclaim for the first time. You can find it later from the main Reclaim settings page, or you can visit https://evanbaldonado.com/reclaim

🆓 Free to install and use.
Enjoy the benefits of Reclaim without spending a dime. Our extension is free to use because your productivity shouldn't come with a price tag. However, you can donate to support the continued development of Reclaim. Donations are non-refundable and do not grant access to additional features or functionality within the extension. https://evanbaldonado.com/reclaim/#donate

📈Request new features.
Reclaim is under active development, and new features are being added. You can view the current list of upcoming features from the main Reclaim settings page and also request new features. https://evanbaldonado.com/reclaim/feature-request
